Package io.github.humbleui.skija.shaper

Class Shaper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.humbleui.skija.impl.Native
      • io.github.humbleui.skija.impl.Managed
        • io.github.humbleui.skija.shaper.Shaper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class Shaper
extends Managed
    Shapes text using HarfBuzz and places the shaped text into a client-managed buffer.
